00014 #ifndef PACKET_OPERATOR_H
00015 #define PACKET_OPERATOR_H
00016 
00017 #include "Packet.h"
00018 #include "AlignUtility.h"
00019 
00047 template < typename PacketType = Packet >
00048 class PacketOperator {
00049 public:
00054    PacketOperator( PacketType& packet, int& startPosition ):
00055       m_packet( packet ),
00056       m_position( startPosition ) {
00057    }
00058 
00060    PacketType& packet() {
00061       return m_packet;
00062    }
00064    int& position() {
00065       return m_position;
00066    }
00067 
00071    template < typename T >
00072    inline void read( T& value );
00073 
00077    template < typename T >
00078    inline void write( const T& value );
00079 
00080 
00082    void alignToLong() {
00083       AlignUtility::alignLong( position() );
00084    }
00085 
00086 private:
00088    PacketType& m_packet;
00090    int& m_position;
00091 };
00092 
00093 template <> template <> inline void 
00094 PacketOperator<>::read< uint32 >( uint32& value ) {
00095    value = packet().incReadLong( position() );
00096 }
00097 
00098 template <> template <> inline void 
00099 PacketOperator< Packet >::read< uint64 >( uint64& value ) {
00100    value = packet().incReadLongLong( position() );
00101 }
00102 
00103 template <> template <> inline void 
00104 PacketOperator< Packet >::read< MC2String >( MC2String& value ) {
00105    packet().incReadString( position(), value );
00106 }
00107 
00108 template <> template <> inline void 
00109 PacketOperator< Packet >::write< uint32 >( const uint32& value ) {
00110    packet().incWriteLong( position(), value );
00111 }
00112 
00113 template <> template <> inline void
00114 PacketOperator< Packet >::write< uint64 >( const uint64& value ) {
00115    packet().incWriteLongLong( position(), value );
00116 }
00117 
00118 template <> template <> inline void 
00119 PacketOperator< Packet >::write< MC2String >( const MC2String& value ) {
00120    packet().incWriteString( position(), value );
00121 }
00122 
00123 #endif // PACKET_OPERATOR_H
